content: left leaning put 17 sts on holders back on needles and also pick up 3 m1r make 1 st right stitch from the cast on edge on the inside of the thumb leaning 20sts pm place marker sm slip marker beginning with the held sts k1 pm this is now the co cast on beginning of round for the thumb stitches the one st s stitch es stitch on the right moves to the end of the round k 15 ssk k1 k2tog 18 sts k15sts slip 1 k2tog pass slipped stitch over 16 sts work 8 rounds of k2 p2 ribbing bind off loosely in rib weave in all ends and block © 2023 galt house of yarn all rights reserved v1 1 www galthouseofyarn ca
